contact_points.description: Mid-body of the bottle (around the label area)
contact_points.usage: Main grasp point for lifting and moving the bottle.

frame_hint.grasp_note: For grasp, use +z of CONTACT as approach direction (V=[0,0,1,0,0,0] in CONTACT).

contact_points.description: Upper body / neck area (below the bottle mouth)
contact_points.usage: Alternative grasp point when precise placement at the mouth is needed.

frame_hint.grasp_note: Use +z CONTACT approach; prefer this when the mouth alignment is important.

functional_points.usage: Target functional axis for capping: the cap should approach along this axis and rotate around it to tighten/loosen.

frame_hint.approach_note: If task says place/seat/put cap onto bottle: translate along +y FUNCTIONAL (V=[0,1,0,0,0,0]).
frame_hint.action_note: If task says tighten/loosen cap: rotate around +y/-y FUNCTIONAL.
